mapper.select: select challenge_no,challenge_title,challenge_kind,challenge_amount,challenge_result, member_no2,c.category_no, to_char(challenge_start,'yyyy-mm-dd') as challenge_start,to_char(challenge_end,'yyyy-mm-dd') as challenge_end, ct.category_title from challenge c left join category_tbl ct ON c.category_no = ct.category_no where member_no2=(select member_no from member where member_id=#{memberId}) and to_char(challenge_end,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and challenge_result = 0 order by 1 desc

select challenge_no,challenge_title,challenge_kind,challenge_amount,challenge_result, member_no2,c.category_no, to_char(challenge_start,'yyyy-mm-dd') as challenge_start,to_char(challenge_end,'yyyy-mm-dd') as challenge_end, ct.category_title from challenge c left join category_tbl ct on c.category_no = ct.category_no where member_no2=(select member_no from member where member_id=#{memberId}) and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') > to_char(challenge_end,'yyyy-mm-dd') or challenge_result = 2 or challenge_result = 1) order by 1 desc

select challenge_no,challenge_title,challenge_kind,challenge_amount,challenge_result, member_no2,member_id,c.category_no, to_char(challenge_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as challenge_start,to_char(challenge_end, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as challenge_end, (select sum(cb.cashbook_money) from cashbook cb where cb.member_no = (select m.member_no from member m where m.member_id = #{memberId}) and cb.cashbook_finance = c.challenge_kind and c.category_no = cb.cashbook_category and cb.cashbook_date between challenge_start and challenge_end) as total, ct.category_title from challenge c join member m on (member_no2 = m.member_no) left join category_tbl ct on (c.category_no = ct.category_no) where c.challenge_no = #{challengeNo}

select challenge_no,challenge_title,challenge_kind,challenge_amount,challenge_result, member_no2,member_id,c.category_no, to_char(challenge_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as challenge_start,to_char(challenge_end, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as challenge_end, (select sum(cb.cashbook_money) from cashbook cb where cb.member_no = (select m.member_no from member m where m.member_id = #{memberId}) and cb.cashbook_date between challenge_start and challenge_end and cb.challenge_no = c.challenge_no) as total, ct.category_title from challenge c join member m on (member_no2 = m.member_no) left join category_tbl ct on (c.category_no = ct.category_no) where c.challenge_no = #{challengeNo}
mapper.insert: insert into challenge values(challenge_seq.nextval,(select member_no from member where member_id=#{memberId}), #{challengeTitle},#{challengeKind},#{challengeAmount},#{challengeStart},#{challengeEnd},1,0,#{challengeCategory})
mapper.update: update challenge set challenge_result = #{challengeResult},challenge where challenge_no = #{challengeNo}
update challenge set challenge_result = 2 where challenge_no in (select challenge_no from challenge where challenge_result =0 and to_char(challenge_end,'yyyy-mm-dd') < to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'))
update challenge set challenge_result =1 where challenge_amount <= (select sum(cashbook_money) from cashbook cb where challenge_no=#{challengeNo}) and challenge_no = #{challengeNo}

update challenge c set challenge_result = 2 where challenge_amount <= (select sum(cb.cashbook_money) from cashbook cb where cb.member_no = (select m.member_no from member m where m.member_id = #{memberId}) and cb.cashbook_finance = c.challenge_kind and c.category_no = cb.cashbook_category and cb.cashbook_date between to_char(c.challenge_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(c.challenge_end, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))
mapper.select: select challenge_no, challenge_title, challenge_start, challenge_end from CHALLENGE where member_no2 = (select member_no from member where member_id=#{memberId}) and challenge_result=0 and CHALLENGE_KIND=1 and (sysdate >= challenge_start and sysdate <= challenge_end )
